name: Thornback Gecko
description: A rather agile and flexible gecko. Its toe pads provide enough suction to help it climb up walls.\nThough this creature has continued to live inside rock crevices after arriving at The Realm Within, the threat posed by its natural predators has been greatly reduced. As a result, it is now also able to stay active outside for longer periods of time.\nFor some unknown reason, even after coming to The Realm Within, certain creatures have retained the unique appearances that were previously formed under the influence of kuuvahki...
